reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and beautifully made, with one noting it makes them feel like a princess.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and nice
items.body: I bought white. I am 5'2 and this is a perfect floor length for me. It comes to just above my ankles. The sleeves are pretty, but a little on the sheer side. I always wear a sweater over my dress anyway. I got a large size, and it fits perfectly. I like the top with the gathers, and the skirt is nicely lined. I wear a longer white slip underneath so I have coverage all the way to the bottom. I like the pockets too. They are nice and deep. I found them to be a little hard to find, but I know I will get used to where they are. The fabric is soft and comfortable. I like the style because it helps to camouflage my menopause middle - meaning the fabric isn't clingy, but loose and flowy. I'm very pleased with my purchase. Read more
items.author: T. K. Tanner

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely white dress
items.body: Beautiful dress and the style looks great. The sizing is correct. Read more
items.author: AZlady

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars VERY MODEST FIT
items.body: I love the color and fit of this dress—it’s flattering, flowy, and super comfortable. The fabric is lightweight but not sheer, and the smocked waist gives it a nice shape without feeling too tight. One thing to note is that this dress is very modest—it covers everything from neck to wrist to ankle, almost like a Mormon-style conservative dress. If you’re looking for something stylish yet fully covered, this is perfect! The pockets are a great bonus, and it works well for dressy or casual occasions. Overall, it’s a lovely, well-made dress, just make sure the modest style is what you’re looking for! Read more
items.author: Lainey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, well made, and true to size.
items.body: I took a chance on this dress even though I didn't see many reviews about it. I needed something for pictures and wow, it was exactly what I was looking for. I'm not a huge fan of elasticized clothing, but this one worked well at the bust and was flattering to my figure. It looked more like a slightly elongated empire waist. The rest of the dress was a beautiful lace with a lining that was not sheer at all. It washed well on delicate cold, and I laid it flat to dry. It looks great, no corners cut that I can see. I wear a medium in most tops and dresses. Sometimes I fit a small. This dress fit like a glove, and I'm sure I could have fit a size large if I wanted it to feel a little bit more roomy. I wear booties with 2" heals, and the dress was the perfect length. It did not drag on the floor. Though it would if I was barefoot. 127 lbs, 5'3, 34D Read more
items.author: JW

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Modest, Full length, opaque! Exactly as pictured
items.body: I wear dress size 14, pant size 14-16 and shirt size L, and I am 5'8". This dress in size XL fits PERFECTLY. It is 100% true to photos. It is EVERYTHING that it looks like, even the clay rose color is accurate. If you are looking for a modest dress, and do not require a super loose bust area, this is IT! For my hijabi friends, the sleeves are *slightly* sheer, but based on the color you order, and your preference, you may not actually need to wear a long sleeve shirt under it. The neckline is slightly wider than a true crew neck, but easily would be covered by a scarf. IMO doesn't need a highneck undershirt, just a hijab. It is full length skirt, even on my slightly tall body. The sleeves go all the way down to my hands, and still have slack/poof. The bodice is comfortably stretchy due to the shirring; it is fitted, but not too tight on my bust. (If you wear larger than DD bra/Large shirt, the bodice may be tighter. It will still fit because it will stretch but if you want a looser bust area, size up.) This dress even has pockets, though they are not very deep. The bodice is completely opaque. The sleeves are slightly sheer, but the pattern and color obscure the view. The skirt is lined and flowy! 10/10 IMO, would order again and recommend to my modest girlies! Read more
items.author: L B

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not right fit for full busted gal.
items.body: Nice dress but not flattering for busty women. Too tight across bust and too loose around shoulders and sleeves. Probably a great dress for slimmer gals. Nice fabric and has pockets! Sorry to have to return. Read more
items.author: Annette E.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Red Dress
items.body: It's very pretty and fits very well Read more
items.author: Stela

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Bean Paste Red, Light Green, Black, Dark Green, Red, Rose Red, Haze Blue, Khaki, Pink, White, Light Blue-1, Beige, Yellow, Watermelon Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
